0: AN ACT CREATING THE LAOAG INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT AUTHORITY, TRANSFERRING EXISTING ASSETS OF THE LAOAG INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT TO THE AUTHORITY, VESTING THE AUTHORITY WITH POWER TO ADMINISTER AND OPERATE THE LAOAG INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02024
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE LAOAG INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT AUTHORITY, TRANSFERRING EXISTING ASSETS OF THE LAOAG INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT TO THE AUTHORITY, VESTING THE AUTHORITY WITH POWER TO ADMINISTER AND OPERATE THE LAOAG INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MARCOS, IMELDA R.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-27
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2016-10-18
          -For feasibility study preparation to determine if passenger traffic is sufficient to maintain the airport
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-08-08
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON TRANSPORTATION
